page.title: 11CHILDREN'S GAMES
page.content: We play games like queenie queenie who's got the ball,chainy tig,kings ball,queens ball and other games. HOW TO PLAY QUEENIE QUEENIE WHO'S GOT THE BALL. One person turns round and the other people stand in a line and the person who's got the ball throws it behind their back and somebody in the line catches the ball.They all put their hands behind their backs and the person who threw the ball turns round and says"Queenie Queenie who's got the ball. Is she tall or is she small or is she like a cannonball." Then the person tries to guess who's got the ball.If they are right the person who has the ball is "it" and if he is wrong he is "it" again.
